text: (nerittulla) oru beadhanam enna nilayilea oru marayute pinnil ninnayikkeantea, oru dutane ayacc allahuvinre anuvadaprakaram avan uddesikkunnat addeham (dutan) beadhanam nalkuka enna nilayilea allate allahu tanneat sansarikkuka enna karyam yatearu manusyannum untavukayilla. tirccayayum avan unnatanum yuktimanumakunnu
